comment:
* A class that limits the amount of data that is read from an InputStream. When
 * the specified length is reached, the stream returns an EOF even if the
 * underlying stream still has more data.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: mEnd
variables.comment: * The end of the stream where we don't want to allow more data to be read.

methods.name: public synchronized int read() throws IOException
public int read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int byteCount) throws IOException
public int read(byte[] buffer) throws IOException

methodNames: public synchronized int read() throws IOException
public int read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int byteCount) throws IOException
public int read(byte[] buffer) throws IOException
